static_fields.name: Buy Horizon Midsize Rubber | Minase Watches | Made in Japan
static_fields.description: Horizon Midsize Rubber is one of Minase's collections. Handmade in Japan, it is a hommage to Japanese crafts and traditions.

review.description: Another hand built masterpiece from Minase!  (I previously purchased a 5 Windows) Excellent craftsmanship is an understatement and it’s my pleasure to wear and talk to people about this watch and brand!

static_fields.review[0].description: Another hand built masterpiece from Minase!  (I previously purchased a 5 Windows) Excellent craftsmanship is an understatement and it’s my pleasure to wear and talk to people about this watch and brand!
static_fields.review[0].author.name: John Mungcal

hasVariant.name: Horizon Midsize Rubber - Purple
hasVariant.description: Horizon is a tribute to Japan. Whenever you go to the shore, you can see the horizon line. So far away, the ocean always looks calm. Horizon Midsize was designed for thinner wrists, a slightly smaller and very elegant alternative.
